mapper.insert: insert into item(item_no, name, price, detail, main_img, sales, c_category_id) values(ITEM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ name }, #{ price }, #{ detail }, 'img', #{ sales }, #{c_category_id})
mapper.select: select ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES from ITEM where ITEM_NO between #{StartNum} and #{endNum} order by item_no
select count(*) cnt from item where C_CATEGORY_ID like '%' || #{c_category_id} || '%'

select filter,ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES from(select rownum filter, ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES,C_CATEGORY_ID from ITEM where C_CATEGORY_ID like '%'|| #{current_category} ||'%' order by item_no) where filter between #{StartNum} and #{endNum}

select filter,ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES from(select rownum filter, ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES from ITEM where NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by item_no) where filter between #{StartNum} and #{endNum}
select count(*) cnt from ITEM where NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select filter,ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES from(select rownum filter, ITEM_NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, MAIN_IMG, SALES from ITEM where C_CATEGORY_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by item_no) where filter between #{StartNum} and #{endNum}
select item_no from(select item_no,C_CATEGORY_ID from item where C_CATEGORY_ID=#{cate} order by item_no desc) where rownum=1
